title: Indulge your taste for luxury at IMT Prestonwood! 1 Bed / 1 Bath!
posting_body: ['IMT Prestonwood', 'Bedroom: 1 | Bathroom: 1', 'Square Footage: 686 - 702 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1535', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', '"Putting You First!"', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', "Located in one of Dallas' premier neighborhoods, IMT Prestonwood offers one and two bedroom floor plans complete with all of the interior features desired in a brand new, LEED Silver luxury apartment community.", "You will be welcomed home to green living where you'll live in an apartment community composed of quality, eco-friendly materials designed to make your living experience as healthy and efficient as possible.", 'From the very beginning, each aspect is thoughtfully planned to minimize our ecological footprint.', 'Expect water and energy efficient products within your apartment home and throughout the community.', 'IMT Prestonwood makes the perfect urban living environment for residents who want it all: including two pools with cabanas and natural gas barbeque grill pavilions, outdoor lounge areas with fireplaces, a Fitness Zone with cardio equipment.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Community Amenities', '◾ Bike Racks', '◾ Cabanas', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Courtesy Patrol', '◾ Cyber Lounge', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Free Weights', '◾ Sports Lounge', '◾ Swimming Pool', '◾ Valet Trash', '◾ Cardio Training', '◾ Controlled Entry', '◾ Courtesy Patrol', '◾ Electric Vehicle Charging Station', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Online Services', '◾ Package Lockers', '◾ Pet Grooming Center', '◾ Resident Parking Garage', '◾ Resident Portal', 'Unit Features', '◾ Cable Satellite Ready', '◾ Central Tankless Water Heater System', '◾ Designer Fixtures & Hardware', '◾ Dual Sinks in Select Bathrooms', '◾ Kenmore® Appliances', '◾ Private Patio or Balcony (select homes)', '◾ Stainless Kitchen Sink', '◾ Two-Tone Designer Paint', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Wood-Style Flooring', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '15480 Dallas Parkway', 'Dallas, TX 75248', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'At IMT Presonwood, we know that the path to your heart is marked with paw prints and that the best part of your day is coming home to a wagging tail.', 'Pets are residents too!', 'Pet Limit: Maximum 2 pets.', 'Weight Restrictions: 1st floor-none.', 'All other floors: Under 25 lbs .', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit: $250 (refundable) per pet.', 'Pet Fee: $250 (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Lease Terms:', '12-Month', 'Management Company:', 'IMT Residential', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY',
